# Account Deletion for Nine Men's Morris

## How to Request Account Deletion

If you wish to delete your Nine Men's Morris account and all associated data, you can request deletion through GitHub:

**ðŸ”— [Request Account Deletion](https://github.com/Blackrifle79/ninemensmorris/issues/new?assignees=&labels=account-deletion%2Cprivacy&template=account-deletion.yml&title=%5BACCOUNT+DELETION%5D+Request+for+account%3A+)**

## What Gets Deleted

When you request account deletion, we will permanently remove:

- âœ… Your user profile and account information
- âœ… All game statistics and scores
- âœ… Leaderboard entries
- âœ… Any stored preferences or settings
- âœ… All personally identifiable information

## Timeline

- **Processing Time**: Up to 30 days
- **Confirmation**: You'll receive a response on your GitHub issue when deletion is complete
- **Irreversible**: This action cannot be undone

## Alternative Contact

If you prefer not to use GitHub, you can also email us directly at:

## Data Export

If you need a copy of your data before deletion, please mention this in your deletion request and we'll provide it in a standard format.

*This process complies with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations.*
